data.name: The Adventures of MICOCO
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’ŸCHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’Ÿ

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1526540/


About the Game

â– Story

One day, the adventurer Micoco discovered an assignment posted by a faraway village.
The village leader needed someone to take care of the horde of monsters that had invaded their settlement. Micoco took on the assignment, not knowing she'd be biting off more than she could chew.

â– Gameplay

Micoco's adventures will consist of solving puzzles and fighting through battle events.
Help her look for clues, piece together past events, and complete the assignment!


ãƒ»Attack of the slimy tentacles!
Cunning tentacle monsters are hidden throughout the ruins, waiting to trap unsuspecting adventurers. Keep Micoco safe from their insidious traps!


ãƒ»Terrible fates await those who fail!
Any slip-up could jeopardize the entire operation, exposing Micoco to the hungry, merciless tentacles. Turn back if you're not ready to take on the consequences!

â– Features

ãƒ»Simple & captivating puzzles

ãƒ»Cute illustrations and sticky tentacles
ãƒ»A complete and compelling storyline

data.short_description: Explore ruins filled with puzzles and hidden tentacles as the cute adventurer Micoco! Will you be able to discover the secrets behind these ancient structures?
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MicrosoftÂ® WindowsÂ® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning: "The Adventures of Micoco" contains violence, brainwashing, rape, tentacles and interspecies sex.
